memberdef.name: ZCL_BINARY_OUTPUT_VARS
memberdef.initializer: const zcl_binary_output_attr_t var ## _attr = { \ { ZCL_BACNET_ATTR_ACTIVE_TEXT, ZCL_ATTRIB_FLAG_READONLY, \ ZCL_TYPE_STRING_CHAR, desc " ON" }, \ { ZCL_BACNET_ATTR_DESCRIPTION, ZCL_ATTRIB_FLAG_READONLY, \ ZCL_TYPE_STRING_CHAR, desc }, \ { ZCL_BACNET_ATTR_INACTIVE_TEXT, ZCL_ATTRIB_FLAG_READONLY, \ ZCL_TYPE_STRING_CHAR, desc " OFF" }, \ { ZCL_BACNET_ATTR_OUT_OF_SERVICE, ZCL_ATTRIB_FLAG_READONLY, \ ZCL_TYPE_LOGICAL_BOOLEAN, &zbot.out_of_service }, \ { { ZCL_BACNET_ATTR_PRESENT_VALUE, ZCL_ATTRIB_FLAG_FULL, \ ZCL_TYPE_LOGICAL_BOOLEAN, &zbot.present_value \ }, 0, 0, NULL, value_write }, \ { { ZCL_BACNET_ATTR_STATUS_FLAGS, \ ZCL_ATTRIB_FLAG_FULL | ZCL_ATTRIB_FLAG_READONLY, \ ZCL_TYPE_BITMAP_8BIT, &zbot.status_flags \ }, 0, 0, status_read, NULL }, \ ZCL_ATTRIBUTE_END_OF_LIST }; \ const zcl_attribute_tree_t var ## _tree[] = \ { { ZCL_MFG_NONE, &var ## _attr.active_text, NULL } }; \ const wpan_cluster_table_entry_t var ## _cluster_table[] = \ { ZCL_CLUST_ENTRY_BASIC_SERVER, \ ZCL_CLUST_ENTRY_IDENTIFY_SERVER, \ { ZCL_CLUST_BINARY_OUT, \ &zcl_general_command, \ var ## _tree, \ WPAN_CLUST_FLAG_SERVER \ }, \ { WPAN_CLUST_ENTRY_LIST_END } \ }; \ wpan_ep_state_t var ## _ep_state;

memberdef.name: ZCL_BINARY_OUTPUT_EXTERN
memberdef.initializer: extern wpan_ep_state_t var ## _ep_state; \ extern const wpan_cluster_table_entry_t var ## _cluster_table[]

briefdescription.para: Create an entry in the endpoint table for a constructed BACnet device.

detaileddescription.para: Parameter name should refer to a wpan_ep_state_t global (named {name}_ep_state) and a const array of wpan_cluster_table_entry_t (named {name}_cluster_table).

briefdescription.para: Macros associated with supporting BACnet under ZigBee.
